_sText:
This is a light_envinment pack for all you new mappers out there. It contains all light_environments from Valve original maps for CS:S. Place these 2 entities anywhere in your map and you'll have a Sun, and lighting. Install Instructions Place the .VMF files in your:
Steamapps/yourname/sourcesdk/bin/prefabs/
directory and have fun! *IMPORTANT* For better results, don't forget to change your skybox name, you can find a list of skyboxes here. I hope that with this I see a lot less Fullbright maps out there.
